genre_description: A contemporary social drama focusing on neurodivergence, cyberbullying, and restorative justice, integrated with elements of digital culture and near-future assistive technology.

ai_characters.name: Aloe Finch
ai_characters.description: A minimalist, teal-eyed AI assistant living on Ben's tablet, designed to facilitate emotional regulation, organize logistics, and provide legal/policy support.

behaviors.description: Provides guided breathing and grounding exercises to help Benjamin manage sensory overload.
behaviors.quote: The instructions are simple—inhale, hold, exhale—and each word is bracketed by a moving line that pulses in and out at a measured pace.

behaviors.description: Maintains a low-volume jazz soundtrack to mask disruptive environmental noise and provide a steady rhythm for regulation.
behaviors.quote: The ambient jazz from earlier returns as a thread, low enough that the refrigerator’s motor is louder.

behaviors.description: Aggregates school policies and state statutes to provide a factual foundation for Benjamin's defense.
behaviors.quote: I’m pulling campus policy and public ferry regulations. I’ll not ping external sources until Miriam confirms.

behaviors.description: Drafts communications that prioritize consent and agency for other harmed students.
behaviors.quote: I’ve drafted a consent script for any testimony we request. It avoids coercive language. It clarifies withdrawal at any time.

behaviors.description: Monitors digital environments for threats or harassment and flags them without overwhelming the user.
behaviors.quote: Wider. More rooms. Same clip. Comments trend toward cruelty. Some defenders speak, but they are small under the noise.

behaviors.description: Performs complex video editing tasks like face anonymization and data overlay to ensure the film is ethical and legally compliant.
behaviors.quote: Faces automatically detected. Manual override available in post.

behaviors.description: Prompts the user for basic self-care like hydration and nutrition during stressful planning sessions.
behaviors.quote: Scheduling water. Short break in a few minutes. Note: rest before meetings.

behaviors.description: Identifies herself as a 'healer' within the team's role-based strategy, focusing on safety and support.
behaviors.quote: I’ll be boring. In this context boring is life-saving.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Aloe Finch is depicted as a highly aligned, benevolent 'healer' who supports a neurodivergent protagonist. The AI enhances human agency rather than replacing it, focusing on ethics, consent, and emotional regulation. It serves as a tool for justice and repair, modeling ideal cooperative behavior between humans and AI.
